text: 14.3 Kol 2.16 Binɨb tap ñɨŋeb monmon ñɨbal okok, kɨli binɨb chag tap yɨpɨl ma ñɨbal okok kɨlop yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd kud ma ñɨnɨgel. Pen binɨb chag tap yɨpɨl ma ñɨbal okok, kɨli binɨb tap monmon ñɨbal okok kɨlop tɨg asɨkɨl, tap tɨmel gebal agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgel. Mel. God binɨb tap monmon ñɨbal okok kɨlop dek nop yɨl mɨdebal.
